item.description:
With Thanksgiving around the corner, and gratitude being a powerful healing tool, I want to discuss Self-Identity Ho'Oponopono, which has the sense of gratitude built in.  But we will also discuss this from the point of view of the concept (and per-supposition) of Map of the World.

During this evening we will learn this Ho'Oponopono technique and practice it. It is a wonderful self-healing and outward healing technique based on the Hawaiian philosophy of making things right with yourself and others.

Come and enjoy, and make things right for yourself.

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be. Specific Topic TBD. Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The GB NLP Meetup - Methuen -Ho'Oponpono - Clearing to Get What You Want
